name: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext
desc: A set of methods that provides information about an in-progress view controller transition.

items.name: func viewController(forKey: UITransitionContextViewControllerKey) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns the view controllers involved in the transition.

items.name: func view(forKey: UITransitionContextViewKey) -> UIView?
items.desc: Returns the specified view involved in the transition.

items.name: var containerView: UIView
items.desc: Returns the view in which the transition takes place.

items.name: var presentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Returns the presentation style being used for the transition.

items.name: var transitionDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: Returns the noninteractive duration of a transition.

items.name: var completionCurve: UIView.AnimationCurve
items.desc: Returns the completion curve associated with the transition.

items.name: var completionVelocity: CGFloat
items.desc: Returns the starting velocity to use for any final animations.

items.name: var percentComplete: CGFloat
items.desc: Returns the percentage of completion for an interactive transition when it moves to its noninteractive phase.

items.name: var initiallyInteractive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition started as an interactive transition.

items.name: var isInteractive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition is currently interactive.

items.name: var isAnimated: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition is explicitly animated.

items.name: var isCancelled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether an interactive transition was cancelled.

items.name: var isInterruptible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the transition animations can be interrupted.

items.name: var targetTransform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: Returns a transform indicating the amount of rotation being applied during the transition.
